Title: Children of a Turtle God
Description:
Volcanoth is the turtle god in the cave that these primitives worship.

It's not really a god.

<Hobart rolls his eyes.>

But it is tough enough that I'm going to have to devise a new weapon for you from the one functioning boot we have left.

I think that the age-old motto of "fight fire with fire" applies here. Plus, I like fire!

Let's get some fire glands from Volcanoth's children. That should give me time to modify the rocket boot into something more fitting.
CompletionText: No time like the present to be done with the simple task I put before you, $n. Wouldn't you agree?
RewardText:
Careful with those glands, $n, careful!

<Grapplehammer's eyes light up at the sight of the fiery organs.>

And now to load them into the refashioned shredder boot. I'm certain that you'll be surprised and amazed by my genius invention.
